title: cherry88
author: cherry88
content: 2x 2013 1oz US Gold Eagles for sale.All photos: https://vgy.me/album/dOpoAXZIThese coins have never been touched by bare hands. Each comes in an Airtite hard plastic holder (see additional photos link).Coin can be purchased individually. Please specify:coin Acoin Bor bothPrice per coin: 1oz gold spot price at time of sale + $10 for USPS priority mail shipping, which is currently 0.0807 BTC = ($1801.76 + $10) รท $22450.20Shipping: Continental United States only. USPS priority mail. I will record an uncut video of the entire packaging and shipping/drop off process.Escrow: minerjones, OgNasty, krogothmanhattan. Escrow fee will be paid half by buyer, half by seller. No escrow required if your positive trust score is above 20: I will send the item, you pay me when you receive it.Payment: BitcoinPayment address: 1EWgaSxUNDAJqWdkEhUXDdWRqoL4wFfPuzI acknowledge this is a new account. However, I am not new, just a long-time lurker with coinage to liquidate and a rep to build

comments.author: cherry88
comments.body: This offer is only available until end-of-day August 12, 2022.
